$documentation.purpose: Registry of User Stories - atomic units of work with acceptance criteria for development.

key_attributes.items[].id: User story identifier following US-{NNN} pattern

validation_rules: Every user story MUST have at least 3 acceptance criteria
Every user story MUST belong to exactly one epic
User story descriptions MUST follow 'As a...I want...so that' format

description: Registry of User Stories for JIRA export

schema.description: As a [persona], I want [goal], so that [benefit]
